content:
# The Stone Furnace has been successfully placed, but it currently has no fuel and no ingredients to smelt, which is indicated by its status as "NO_FUEL".
# To start smelting the Iron Ore into Iron Plates, I need to add fuel to the furnace and insert the Iron Ore.

# I will need to add some Coal as fuel. Since I currently do not have any Coal in my inventory, I will need to find a Coal patch and harvest some.

# Let's locate the nearest Coal resource.
coal_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)
move_to(coal_position)  # Move to the position of the nearest Coal patch.
